name: Music for Weddings -Volume1
description: Includes Mendelssohn's Wedding March, Dona Nobis Pacem, Ave Maria (Arcadelt) & a lively Gavotte by Lully. These four pieces fit on to three pages and are a great addition to your wedding repertoire.

name: She Moved Through The Fair for String Quartet
description:
One of the most beautiful and well-known Irish airs. The Viola and 2nd violin take turns with the main melody while being supported with a slight medieval flavour by the cello and 1st violin.

Approximately 01:45 long.
Difficulty grade 1-3.

Arranged for String Quartet by Patrick Olsen. 

Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F104550138%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-MyJ4z"></iframe>

name: Seinn Alleluia for String Quartet
description:
A traditional (and ancient sounding) Irish gospel acclamation. Very useful in weddings, church services or coupled with medieval music.

1 1/2 minutes long. Easily repeatable.
Difficulty grade 3-4.

Arranged for String Quartet by Patrick Olsen.

Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F104676109"></iframe>

name: O' Carolan's Concerto for String Quartet
description:
An enduring composition by the blind 17th century Irish harper, Turlough O' Carolan. This arrangement was written with a nod to joyous early baroque music. A real pleasure to play!

Arranged for String Quartet by Patrick Olsen. 
Approximately two minutes long, but it is meant to be repeated.

Violin 1 has the most challenging part (grade 5-6) whereas the the other instruments have an easier time (grades 3-4).

Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F104604269"></iframe>

name: Inisheer for String Quartet
description:
An especially well-loved Irish melody. It is commonly played at traditional music sessions and ceremonies. 

Arranged for String Quartet by Patrick Olsen.
2 1/2 minutes long.
Difficulty grade 3-4.

Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F104583784"></iframe>

name: House of the Rising Sun for String Quartet
description:
This New Orleans classic has been reinvigorated for S.A.T.B. saxophone quartet by arranger Patrick Olsen. A 40-second introduction builds to a climax, announcing the entry of the famous melody. There are also sections where the 1st violin and cello can improvise or play a written solo melody. 

03:10 duration.
Grade 4-5 difficulty.

Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F104589060%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-Q7Nhf"></iframe>

name: Give Me Your Hand (Tabhair Dom Do Lámh) for String Quartet
description:
Composed in the early 17th century by the Irish harper Ruaidri Dáll Ó Catháin, this piece is a standard at Irish weddings and festive occasions. The melody is equally shared by all four instruments and is a pleasure to play.
We highly recommend playing it with O' Carolan's Concerto!

Arranged for String Quartet by Patrick Olsen. 

Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F104545614%3Fsecret_token%3Ds-Ffh5Z"></iframe>

name: House of the Rising Sun for Saxophone Quartet
description: This New Orleans classic has been reinvigorated for S.A.T.B. saxophone quartet by arranger Patrick Olsen. A 40-second introduction builds to a climax, announcing the entry of the famous melody. There is also a solos section where the tenor and alto join to provide backing support for baritone and soprano sax solos. 03:10 duration. Grade 3-4 difficulty. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Joshua Fit The Battle of Jericho
description:
An uptempo American spiritual that is fast, exciting and really grooves. It starts with solo baritone and clapping and keeps building up. All four saxophones take turns leading the tune. Highly recommended! 
S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet arranged by Patrick Olsen. 
03:10 duration.
Grade 7+ difficulty.
Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/124377900&color=ff6600&auto_play=false&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: Dia de los Muertos  by Patrick Olsen
description: An exciting new latin sax quartet from Patrick Olsen. Complete with compelling bass lines, screaming brass-like fanfares and a smooth and memorable melody line. Seriously, give this one a listen! 3 1/2 minutes long. Difficulty grade 6-8. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: National Obsession by Patrick Olsen
description: A recent composition for Saxophone Quartet (S.A.T.B.) by Patrick Olsen. The music describes how everyday conversations can brighten, darken, or lighten with the frequent changes in the weather. It begins with a deliberately plodding 8/8 rhythm of a soaked protagonist and then changes unexpectedly, like the weather! Just over three minutes long. Difficulty grade 5-6 Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Bridal Chorus from Lohengrin by Richard Wagner
description:
"Here Comes the Bride". Probably the most necessary wedding processional/recessional to have in your book. This arrangement features an exciting baritone finale. Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. Just over two minutes long. Difficult level 4-6. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

href="http://vimeo.com/63565087">Wagner Bridal Chorus from Fritz Wolf Music Publishing on Vimeo.

name: Seinn Alleluia
description: A traditional (and ancient sounding) Irish gospel acclamation. Very useful in weddings, church services or coupled with medieval music. Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. 1 1/2 minutes long. Easily repeatable. Difficulty grade 2-3. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Panis Angelicus  by César Franck
description: This extraordinary song has been arranged so that the alto carries the main melody. A must for church communion services. Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. Just under four minutes long. Difficulty grade 3-4. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Wedding March by Felix Mendelssohn
description: Originally used as incidental music for A Midsummer Night's Dream (op.61), This music has become a must-have for wedding processionals and recessionals. Here it is arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. Just under two minutes long but with options for repeating sections just in case the bridal party is running late. Difficulty grade 4-5. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Inisheer (Inis Thiar) -Traditional Irish Melody
description:
An especially well-loved Irish melody. It is commonly played at traditional music sessions, weddings and funerals. This version has been scored as a trio for baritone, tenor and alto saxophones. It gives soprano players a chance to rest their lips!
Arranged for A.T.B. Saxophone Trio by Patrick Olsen.
2 1/2 minutes long.
Difficulty grade 3-4.
Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all three parts.

<iframe width="13%" height="65" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F86223600"></iframe>

name: Give Me Your Hand (Tabhair Dom Do Lámh)
description: Composed in the early 17th century by the Irish harper Ruaidri Dáll Ó Catháin, this piece is a standard at Irish weddings and romantic occasions. The melody is equally shared by all four saxophones and is a pleasure to play. We highly recommend playing it right after O' Carolan's Concerto! Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. 02:30 minutes long. Difficulty grade 2-3. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Gavotte by Jean-Baptiste Lully
description: This dance comes from the 17th century court composer of Louis XIV of France. Its bright theme journeys from major to minor and back again in just over four minutes. Great for any occasion where a touch of Versailles would be appreciated. Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. Difficulty grade 4-5 (The soprano part is more challenging than the other three parts). Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: O' Carolan's Concerto
description: An enduring composition by the blind 17th century Irish harper, Turlough O' Carolan. This arrangement for S.A.T.B. saxophone quartet was written with a nod to joyous early baroque music. A real pleasure to play! Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. Approximately two minutes long, but it is meant to be repeated. The soprano has the most challenging part (grade 5-6) whereas the the other instruments have an easier time (grades 3-4). Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: She Moved Through The Fair
description: One of the most beautiful and well-known Irish airs. This is an especially popular piece for romantic occasions. The tenor and alto saxophones take turns with the main melody and are supported with a slight medieval flavour from the soprano and baritone. Arranged for S.A.T.B. Saxophone Quartet by Patrick Olsen. Approximately 01:45 long. Difficulty grade 1-3. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Minuetto. (The Ladykillers) by Luigi Boccherini
description: The Boccherini minuetto from the String Quintet in E. Made famous in the movie "The Lady Killers". Arranged for Saxophone Quartet (S.A.T.B.) by Patrick Olsen. Approximately 4 minutes long. Grade 4-6 difficulty. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Ave Maria by Anton Bruckner
description: Bruckner's choral masterpiece arranged for S.A.T.B. saxophone quartet by Patrick Olsen. Perfect for wedding day repertoire and echoing church acoustics! Approximately 2.5 minutes long. Grade 1-3 difficulty. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.

name: Ave Maria by Jacques Arcadelt
description: Renaissance composer Jacques Arcadelt worked with the choir at The Vatican and wrote some of the finest motets of the entire genre. His Ave Maria is arranged here for saxophone quartet (S.A.T.B.) by Patrick Olsen. The lead part may be played by soprano or alto. Approximately 2 minutes long. Grade 1-3. Sold as a downloadable PDF file containing all four parts.
